title: Cuemon
description:
The Cuemon.Core assembly is the patriarch of the Cuemon .NET Core family and provides fundamental-, utility- and base-classes that define commonly-used value and reference data types, events and event handlers, interfaces, attribute, and feature rich delegates to greatly support functional programming.

A great addition to the well established System namespace to make your daily operations easier to work with.

packOptions.summary: A free and flexible assembly family, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
packOptions.releaseNotes: The .NET Platform Standard release of the ported Cuemon .NET Framework.
